text:
🦠💉🧒 #Pfizer announced Wednesday that its #Covid19 #vaccine is safe and strongly protective in kids as young as 12.

This is could be a step toward possibly beginning shots in this age group before they head back to #school in the fall.

France 24's @YukaF24 has the details ⤵️ https://t.co/Vnq651lFeg
